channel.title: CVE Feed for adfinis -- document-merge-service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for adfinis -- document-merge-service

item.title: CVE-2024-37301|2024-06-12T19:21:11.274Z -- adfinis -- document-merge-service
item.description: Document Merge Service is a document template merge service providing an API to manage templates and merge them with given data. Versions 6.5.1 and prior are vulnerable to remote code execution via server-side template injection which, when executed as root, can result in full takeover of the affected system. As of time of publication, no patched version exists, nor have any known workarounds been disclosed.

item.title: CVE-2024-37301|2024-06-11T20:21:20.380Z -- adfinis -- document-merge-service
item.description: Document Merge Service is a document template merge service providing an API to manage templates and merge them with given data. Versions 6.5.1 and prior are vulnerable to remote code execution via server-side template injection which, when executed as root, can result in full takeover of the affected system. As of time of publication, no patched version exists, nor have any known workarounds been disclosed.
